opa 0.6.0 API

Packages 
Package Description
com.github.nwillc.opa
OPA is a lightweight object persistence approach.
com.github.nwillc.opa.impl.jdbc
A proof of concept JDBC based Dao.
com.github.nwillc.opa.impl.memory
A concrete implementation persisting data into memory only.
com.github.nwillc.opa.impl.mongo
An simple implementation based on MongoDb persistence.
com.github.nwillc.opa.junit
JUnit support which can be used to test DAO implementations.
com.github.nwillc.opa.query
This package supports a simplistic query interface implemented by the specific implementations.
com.github.nwillc.opa.transaction
A simplistic transaction package based on the memento pattern.
com.github.nwillc.opa.util
Utility classes used in the OPA framework.
